titleStmt.title: The audi filia, or a rich cabinet full of spirituall ievvells. Composed by the Reuerend Father, Doctour Auila, translated out of Spanish into English
Audi filia. English
titleStmt.author: John, of Avila, Saint, 1499?-1569.
Matthew, Tobie, Sir, 1577-1655.

notesStmt.note: Translator's dedication signed: L.T., i.e. Sir Tobie Matthew.
Running title reads: A rich cabbinet, full of spirituall iewells.
Printer and place of publication from STC.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
